content: this is the 2nd crochet pattern i have designed and written up myself if there are any errors and if there is something you are unsure of please contact me i used cygnets pure baby dk in rose for the body of the blanket and cream for the border i used 3 balls of rose and 1 ball of cream materials needed 4mm hook stitch markers darning needle scissors two downloads are available one uses uk terms the other uses us terms i hope you enjoy making this gorgeous baby blanket
